dialog.intro: I have a question for you...
dialog.question: will you marry me?

rsvp.rsvpNotification: invites are closing soon, don't miss out!

card_weddinggift.label: wedding gift?
card_weddinggift.text: dear guests, instead of a gift, please donate to our wedding. we will be grateful for any amount.

card_harmonogram.label: harmonogram:
card_harmonogram.text:
14:00 - gates of the brewery are opening.
14:45 - transfer to the castle park for the ceremony.
15:00 - the ceremony.
16:00 - entertainment program in the brewery.
20:00 - uncontrolled entertainment program in the brewery.

responseMessage.success: we are looking forward to you!
responseMessage.error: something went wrong... try again later or contact kostejns directly
